statement.p: Sonia is making candles in the shape of a cylinder. She needs to determine how many cubic centimeters of wax she needs.
Suppose the radius of the candle is 4.0 cm and the height of the candle is 15.0 cm. Round using significant figures.

ol.li: How much wax is needed for one candle? {cm}^{3}
How much wax is needed for 20 candles? {cm}^{3}
